lines.text: Neither of you happened to, like...
...accidentally bleed all over the corpse when you got here, right?
Or deliberately bleed all over the corpse, Whydah?
That- have you- have you seen the body? That- that much blood?
...And you're not secretly dead and pretending to be alive.
Wh- what?! How would I even- that's...!
She ain't that kind of bloodsucker, Seeker.
